component.name: Julius
component.summary: Julius is an open source re-implementation of Caesar III

description.p: Julius is a fully working open-source version of Caesar III, with the same logic as the original, but with some UI enhancements, that is able to be played on multiple platforms. The same logic means that the saved games are 100% compatible, and any gameplay bugs present in the original Caesar 3 game will also be present in Julius.
description.ul:
UI enhancements include:
Support for widescreen resolutions
Windowed mode support for 32-bit desktops
A lot of small in-game quality of life improvements
description.p: Julius requires the original assets (graphics, sounds, etc) from Caesar III to run. It optionally supports the high-quality MP3 files once provided on the Sierra website.
